response.overview: Star Trek: Deception is the story of two Starfleet officers, Commander Stoven and Lieutenant Miller, who are transporting a Klingon prisoner to a detention center aboard a Danube Class Runabout, only to be ambushed by a Klingon Bird of Prey en route to their destination. Unwilling to give up their prisoner, the officers soon find themselves staring down the barrel of Klingon disruptor cannons as they battle for their very lives and attempt to escape.
response.title: Star Trek: Deception
